languages.text: "Какая ирония... Они до смерти боятся и поклоняются {mf|тому|той}, кого в жизни не видели. А встретив {mf|его|ее} лично — не могут признать".

traits.locale_text: "Какая ирония... Они до смерти боятся и поклоняются {mf|тому|той}, кого в жизни не видели. А встретив {mf|его|ее} лично — не могут признать".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."
languages.original_text: "Какая ирония... Они до смерти боятся и поклоняются {mf|тому|той}, кого в жизни не видели. А встретив {mf|его|ее} лично — не могут признать".

traits.locale_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and worshipping someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and worshipping someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and worshipping someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这真是太讽刺了……这些人一辈子都在崇拜、畏惧某个他们永远都见不到的人，而当他们真的见到{mf|他|她}时，却认不出来{mf|他|她}。”
languages.original_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: “这真是太讽刺了……这些人一辈子都在崇拜、畏惧某个他们永远都见不到的人，而当他们真的见到{mf|他|她}时，却认不出来{mf|他|她}。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Qué irónico... Se pasan las vidas temiendo y venerando a una persona a la que jamás verán, y, cuando se la encuentran en persona, ni siquiera la reconocen».
languages.original_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: «Qué irónico... Se pasan las vidas temiendo y adorando a una persona a la que jamás verán, y, cuando se la encuentran en persona, ni siquiera la reconocen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「なんて皮肉なのかしら…一生会うこともない誰かを恐れ、崇拝して生きてきたってことなのね。ご本人と会っても分からないだなんて」
languages.original_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて皮肉なのかしら…一生会うこともない誰かを恐れ、崇拝して生きてきたってことなのね。ご本人と会っても分からないだなんて」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Amusant... Ils passent leur vie à craindre et vénérer de loin {mf|un parfait inconnu|une parfaite inconnue}, et quand ils ont la chance de {mf|le|la} rencontrer en personne, ils ne {mf|le|la} reconnaissent même pas. »
languages.original_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: « Amusant... Ils passent leur vie à craindre et vénérer de loin {mf|un parfait inconnu|une parfaite inconnue}, et quand ils ont la chance de {mf|le|la} rencontrer en personne, ils ne {mf|le|la} reconnaissent même pas. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Was für eine Ironie! Ihr ganzes Leben fürchten und verehren sie jemanden, den sie niemals sehen werden, und wenn doch, erkennen sie ihn nicht."
languages.original_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Was für eine Ironie! Ihr ganzes Leben fürchten und verehren sie jemanden, den sie niemals sehen werden, und wenn doch, erkennen sie ihn nicht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Çok ironik... Ömürleri boyunca asla görmeyecekleri birinden korkup saygı besliyorlar ama gördüklerinde de asla farkına varamıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "How ironic... They spend all their lives fearing and revering someone they will never see, and when they do meet {mf|him|her}, they do not recognise {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Çok ironik... Ömürleri boyunca asla görmeyecekleri birinden korkup saygı besliyorlar ama gördüklerinde de asla farkına varamıyorlar."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
